name: Finger Run Lite - treadmill for fingers
name_original: Finger Run Lite - treadmill for fingers
description: Finger Run Lite is not just a game. Finger Run Lite is an exercise application for running with your fingers. Using our game provides a wonderful workout. Try it yourself and see how fast you can run and how fast your fingers. Run regularly and see how you can improve your time. Exercise anywhere, at work, at school, at home, anywhere! Stay fit!
